name: Dr. Israetel’s Hypertrophy Mesocycle (8-12 reps)
time_per_session_breakdown: Multiple exercises x 3-4 sets each, 8-12 reps
overview_and_execution: Week 1 start ~3 RIR. Each week add volume (an extra set) or load to maintain ~2 RIR. By final week, you’re at ~1 RIR or 0 RIR. Then deload.
example_application: Leg Day: 4 sets of squats (8-12 reps, ~3 RIR). Next week, 5 sets or slight load increase, keep reps in 8-12 but RIR ~2, etc.
important_notes: Focus on incremental overload, track RIR carefully. Suited to moderate volume hypertrophy.
volume_metrics: Total sets per muscle 10→15+ across mesocycle
